Title: Mens Sekonda rose plated chronograph watch 3490
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Mens Sekonda rose plated chronograph watch 3490 RRP £149.99 Now £79.99 Description This chunky mens Sekonda watch has a bold and imposing design. The black rubber strap has a ridged texture and it is secured with a rose tone buckle with a matte effect. The rose gold colour is continued on to the casing where the rose gold tone casing contrasts brilliantly against the black rubber strap and round black dial. The round black dial is framed by a chunky bezel which has visible screw heads for a tough, industrial effect. Rose gold tone and red batons mark the hours and the addition of the bright red adds flashes of colour to this contemporary mens Sekonda watch. Three smaller dials show the chronograph function in action and the chronograph is controlled using the buttons position either side of the winder. There is a date window at the 6 o’clock position and this mens Sekonda watch is 100m water resistant. We are authorised stockists of Sekonda watches and each one comes in the official, branded Sekonda box with a 2 year warranty.
